com.github.lucbui.bytes

Class PointerObject<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.lucbui.bytes.PointerObject<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - The Object class

    public final class PointerObject<O>
extends java.lang.Object
    A "fat pointer" which encapsulates an object, and a pointer to that object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PointerObject(Pointer pointer, O object)
      Create a PointerObject By default, a disabling RepointStrategy is used.
      PointerObject(Pointer pointer, O object, RepointStrategy repointStrategy)
      Creates a PointerObject with specified RepointStrategy
